category.title: Data Collector Category
category.callout: Begin creating your request by selecting an industry that provides you a service you're interested in learning more about.
category.label: Category

operator.title: {{industry}}: Select an organization
operator.callout: Begin creating your request by selecting an organization that provides your services. You're entitled to do this for all organizations that provide you such services.
operator.label: Organization

questions.title: Customize your request
questions.callout: Ask questions about how your data is collected, used, shared, and stored. Get specific about the data you'd like access to. We may have some helpful defaults.

subject.title: Identifying information
subject.callout: Your identifying information will be used to create a formal letter and also help {{company}} identify you in its records. Remember, this form does not collect your data â€“ it creates a letter for you to send yourself.
subject.label: Basic Personal Information

request.title: Your Request to {{operator}}

instructions.read-careful: Please read over the generated letter carefully!
instructions.post-instructions: Option 1: Print your letter by first generating a PDF with the below button. Put it in an envelope and mail to:
instructions.email-instructions: Option 2: Email your letter using the email button. If that doesn't work, or if using webmail, please copy and paste the letter below and send to:
instructions.email-unavailable: Option 2 Unavailable: No email listed for company privacy officer.

request.emailProblem: Problem? Simply copy & paste the below text into your email client and send to {{email}}
request.continue: Continue on to maximize your impact

wrapper.disclaimer: Disclaimer: This is a research and educational tool and is meant for informational purposes only. This service does not provide legal advice. You are solely responsible for your use of this service and any resulting consequences. Open Effect and partners make no claims, promises, or guarantees about the accuracy, completeness, or adequacy of the information contained in this document. This software is offered as-is, with no warranty. Nothing herein should be used as a substitute for the legal advice of competent counsel.
wrapper.license: This work is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial-ShareAlike 4.0 International License.

modal.title: Share your feedback
modal.desc: Please share your thoughts on using Access My Info.

questions.easyToUse: Access My Info is easy to use.
questions.quickToLearn: I learned to use it quickly.
questions.fewSteps: It requires the fewest steps possible to accomplish what I want to do with it.
questions.noInstructions: I can use it without written instructions.
questions.mistakeRecover: I can recover from mistakes quickly and easily.
questions.success: I can use it successfully every time.
questions.recommend: I would recommend it to a friend.
questions.like: What did you like about Access My Info?
questions.challenge: What challenges did you face while using Access My Info?
questions.industry: What industries or government departments would you like to see AMI support next?
questions.general: Do you have any other comments?

offline.title: We are offline!
offline.sorry: Sorry about this, but Access My Info is currently offline!
offline.soon: Rest assured, we're working hard to bring it back up as soon as possible.

messages.R1: Thank you. There are now {{count}} requests created for {{operator}} in {{jurisdiction}}.
messages.R2: Sorry, you've created a request to {{operator}} too recently.
messages.V1: The email address {{email}} has been verified and subscribed to notifications.
messages.V2: This email address has already been verified.
messages.V7: No consent given for email address to be collected.
messages.M1: Unable to send email at this time.
messages.M2: You've provided an invalid email address.
messages.U2: Unable to unsubcribe {{email}} from AMI notifications.
messages.F2: Unable to save feedback. No feedback provided.
